resources.string: Automatically restoring purchases is not currently supported by PayPal. If you have any issues or need to restore a purchase, please email Support@DontPause.me with your order number and I will restore it manually.
"Check out this app that has enhanced my Android music experience"
Dont Pause is monitoring your music...
"Disabling the notification may cause the service to be killed by your system if memory gets low"
"Notification Disabled - the service can be killed by your task manager"
"Check to only silence the notification stream (Check if it is vibrating between songs)"
"Only silencing notifications, feel free to adjust your ringer"
"Check to set the ringer to normal if you stop the service with music playing "
"Don't Pause will turn your ringer back to normal if you stop the service with music playing"
"Check to start the service when a usb cable is connected"
"Don't Pause will start the next time you connect a usb cable"
"Check to start the service when a bluetooth device is connected"
"Don't Pause will start the next time you connect a bluetooth device"
"Check to start the service when your device is turned on"
"Don't Pause will start on the next boot"
"Check to start the service when your Headphones are connected"
"Don't Pause will start when you connect your headphones"
"This app is free because it's ad supported. If you don't want to see ads, turn them off here."
"Leave a review if you enjoy the app"
This application is not licensed. Please purchase it from Android Market.
Unable to validate license. Check to see if a network connection is available.
Thank you for supporting the developer!
